Name: maximize_feature_priority
Description: Maximize the sum of priorities for all features completed in a project.

Name: minimize_total_task_effort
Description: Minimize the sum of effort for all tasks required to complete the selected user stories.

Name: maximize_story_points_in_sprint
Description: Maximize the total number of story points completed within a single sprint.

Name: minimize_project_timeline
Description: Minimize the project's end date, effectively shortening the overall project duration.

Name: maximize_team_satisfaction
Description: Maximize the average team satisfaction score across all sprint retrospectives.

Name: minimize_number_of_blockers
Description: Minimize the total count of blockers that occur during a project.

Name: maximize_sprint_goal_achievement
Description: Maximize the achievement status of sprint goals across all sprints.

Name: minimize_budget_usage
Description: Minimize the overall budget consumption for a project.

Name: maximize_stakeholder_influence_satisfaction
Description: Maximize the value delivered to stakeholders with the highest influence level.

Name: maximize_team_velocity
Description: Maximize the average velocity of a team over the course of the project.

Name: minimize_blocker_severity
Description: Minimize the cumulative severity of all blockers encountered.
